TakeLook: Take a look at my portfolio.

PolMed: Website for Pol-Med company, offering modern educational stations for the automotive industry, UCO cooking oils, and a wide selection of industrial tools. The project, built in React, ensures easy navigation and access to the company's extensive product range.
KrainaPsa: Website for a grooming salon allowing pet owners to book appointments for their pets' grooming sessions. Built using React and Tailwind CSS, the site offers fast and intuitive booking features along with a modern design.
BioFloor: Website for BioFloor Bedding, offering modern sunflower bedding for livestock farming. Built with Next.js using static generation, Tailwind CSS, Lucide Icons, and shadcn, it provides intuitive navigation, attractive design, and showcases benefits.
Arsenal: My technological arsenal is at your disposal!
MyAdventure: My educational adventure is still going strong, covering high school and my planned college.
